function.name: washingTemperatureMode_setValue
function.description: This function is used to set the water temperature mode of a washing machine.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to adjust the water temperature mode.

predefinedCompartment.description: The predefined compartment for adjusting the water temperature mode.

mode.description: The mode to which the water temperature should be set.
